title: register a new user with valid data
description: Test the /auth/signup endpoint to ensure a new user can register successfully with valid email and password inputs.

title: sign in user with correct credentials
description: Verify the /auth/signin endpoint allows a user to sign in successfully when provided with valid email and password.

title: sign out user successfully
description: Check the /auth/signout endpoint to confirm that a signed-in user can log out successfully.

title: get all products list
description: Test the /products GET endpoint to retrieve the full list of 6 preloaded products with correct details and images.

title: get product details by id
description: Verify the /products/{id} GET endpoint returns the correct product details for a valid product ID and returns 404 for invalid IDs.

title: get cart items for current user
description: Test the /cart/items GET endpoint to fetch the current user's cart items with accurate quantity and product information.

title: add item to cart with valid input
description: Verify the /cart/items POST endpoint adds a product to the cart successfully when provided with valid product_id and quantity.

title: update cart item quantity
description: Test the /cart/items/{product_id} PATCH endpoint to update the quantity of a specific cart item and handle item not found errors.

title: remove item from cart
description: Check the /cart/items/{product_id} DELETE endpoint to remove a specific item from the cart and handle cases where the item does not exist.

title: clear all cart items
description: Verify the /cart/items DELETE endpoint clears all items from the current user's cart successfully.
